abstract_summ: The appearance of severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) in China triggered a major global epidemic, which is now a major community health issue . As of April 17, 2020, according to Institute of Epidemiology, Disease Control and Research (IEDCR) Bangladesh has reported 1838 confirmed cases in between 8 March to 17 April 2020, with > 4.08% of mortality rate and >3.15% of recovery rate .
